definitions.definition: A pervasive neurological condition that is observable in early childhood and persists throughout the lifespan, characterised by atypical communication patterns (e.g., differences in body language or eye contact ), delayed language development, and sensory processing sensitivities .

subdefinitions.definition: Synonym of autism spectrum ; a range of disorders.

definitions.definition: A diagnosis involving a pathological tendency to engage in self-centered fantasy thinking, historically considered a symptom of insanity and/or schizophrenia .
Abnormal and unhealthy focus or persistence , stereotypically coupled with low self-awareness and unhealthy hatred of opposition or criticism .
definitions.label_groups: Internet slang , offensive , derogatory or self-deprecatory

main_definition: ( clinical psychology ) A pervasive neurological condition that is observable in early childhood and persists throughout the lifespan, characterised by atypical communication patterns (e.g., differences in body language or eye contact ), delayed language development, and sensory processing sensitivities .
secondary_definitions: ( clinical psychology , obsolete ) A diagnosis involving a pathological tendency to engage in self-centered fantasy thinking, historically considered a symptom of insanity and/or schizophrenia .

( Internet slang , offensive , derogatory or self-deprecatory ) Abnormal and unhealthy focus or persistence , stereotypically coupled with low self-awareness and unhealthy hatred of opposition or criticism .
